tool_description: Validates income-related documents such as pay stubs, W-2s, and 1099s for authenticity and completeness in underwriting processes.

document_type.description: Type of income document (pay_stub, w2, 1099, employment_letter)

document_data.description: Base64 encoded document content or structured text data

applicant_name.description: Full name of the insurance applicant

error_messages: Invalid document type: Use one of [pay_stub, w2, 1099, employment_letter]
Document parsing failed: Ensure document_data is properly encoded and readable
Missing required fields: Document must contain employer, income amount, and date information
Name mismatch: Applicant name does not match document recipient name
usage: Provide document_type, document_data (base64 encoded), and applicant_name. Optionally specify expected_income_range for additional validation. Returns validation status and extracted financial information.

document_date.description: Date from the document in ISO format

validation_notes.description: Array of validation observations and warnings
